TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebServiceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WebServiceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WebServiceAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 用于向 XML Web services 添加附加信息，如描述其功能的字符串。

span.span: Used to add additional information to an XML Web service, such as a string describing its functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于要发布和执行 XML Web service，不是必需的。The is not required for an XML Web service to be published and executed. 你可以使用 `WebServiceAttribute` 指定不受公共语言运行时标识符规则限制的 XML Web service 的名称，该标识符在服务说明和 XML Web service 的服务帮助页中使用。You can use the `WebServiceAttribute` to specify a name for the XML Web service that is not restricted by the rules for a common language runtime identifier, which is used in the service description and the Service help page for the XML Web service. XML Web service 应更改其默认的 XML 命名空间，然后将其公开。An XML Web service should change its default XML namespace before it is made public. 每个 XML Web service 都需要一个唯一的 XML 命名空间来标识该命名空间，以便客户端应用程序可以将其与 Web 上的其他服务区分开来。Each XML Web service needs a unique XML namespace to identify it so that client applications can distinguish it from other services on the Web. http://tempuri.org/适用于正在开发的 XML Web services，但发布的 XML Web services 应使用更永久性的命名空间。http://tempuri.org/ is available for XML Web services that are under development, but published XML Web services should use a more permanent namespace. 您的 XML Web service 应由您控制的 XML 命名空间标识。Your XML Web service should be identified by a XML namespace that you control. 例如，你可以使用公司的 Internet 域名作为 XML 命名空间的一部分。For example, you could use your company's Internet domain name as part of the XML namespace. 尽管许多 XML Web service XML 命名空间看起来像 Url，但它们不需要指向 Web 上的实际资源。Although many XML Web service XML namespaces look like URLs, they need not point to an actual resource on the Web. (XML Web service XML 命名空间为 Uri。 ) 用于使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web services，则可以使用属性更改默认的 XML 命名空间 。(XML Web service XML namespaces are URIs.) For XML Web services created using ASP.NET, the default XML namespace can be changed using property. 有关使用特性的详细信息，请参阅[特性](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). ## Examples 下面的示例将 的属性设置 为 `"Common Server Variables"` ，并将 XML 命名空间设置为 `http://www.microsoft.com/` 。The following example sets the property of the to `"Common Server Variables"` and sets the XML namespace to `http://www.microsoft.com/`. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceAttribute Example](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceAttribute Example](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

The default value for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: XML Web services 的描述性消息。

span.span: A descriptive message for the XML Web service.

value.span: 对 XML Web services 的功能进行描述的文本。

span.span: The text describing the functionality of the XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当生成 XML Web service 的说明文档时（如服务说明和服务帮助页），将在 XML Web service 的预期使用者中显示描述性消息。The descriptive message is displayed to prospective consumers of the XML Web service when description documents for the XML Web service are generated, such as the Service Description and the Service help page. ## Examples 下面的示例将 属性设置为 `"Common Server Variables"` 。The following example sets the property to `"Common Server Variables"`. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceAttribute Example](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceAttribute Example](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML Web services 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the XML Web service.
The name for the XML Web service.

value.span: 默认值是实现 XML Web services 的类的名称。

span.span: Default value is the name of the class implementing the XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户导航到 XML Web service 的 URL 并提供的查询字符串时，将生成服务说明？.WSDL.The Service Description is generated when a user navigates to the URL for the XML Web service and supplies a query string of ?WSDL. 在服务说明中， 属性标识 XML Web service 的 XML 限定名的本地部分。Within the Service Description, the property identifies the local part of the XML qualified name for the XML Web service. `Name`属性还用于显示服务帮助页上的 XML Web service 的名称。The `Name` property is also used to display the name of the XML Web service on the Service help page. 当预期使用者导航到 XML Web service 的 .asmx 页面，而不指定 XML Web service 方法名称及其参数时，将显示服务帮助页。The Service help page is displayed when a prospective consumer navigates to the.asmx page for the XML Web service without specifying an XML Web service method name and its parameters. XML 限定名称用于区分具有 XML 文档的名称相同的元素。An XML qualified name is used to disambiguate elements with the same name with an XML document. XML 限定名称由以下两部分组成：由冒号：命名空间分隔的部分或与命名空间和本地部分关联的前缀。An XML qualified name consists of the following two parts separated by a colon: namespace or a prefix associated with a namespace and local part. 命名空间由 URI 引用组成，而对于服务说明，它是属性的值 。The namespace consists of a URI reference and for the purposes of the Service Description, is the value of the property. 通常，前缀与 URI 的别名相同，与命名空间相关联，因此使用命名空间的所有后续 XML 限定名称都可以使用缩写前缀。In general, a prefix, which acts like an alias to an URI, is associated with the namespace, so that all subsequent XML qualified names using the namespace can use the shortened prefix. 本地部分是一个字符串，以字母或下划线开头，不含空格。The local part is a string beginning with a letter or underscore containing no spaces. 因此，在服务说明中标识 XML Web service 的 XML 限定名称采用以下格式：Therefore, the XML qualified name identifying a XML Web service in the Service Description is in the following format: : : 有关 XML 限定名称的详细信息，请参阅[xml 1.0 中的命名空间](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)。For more information on XML qualified names, see [Namespaces in XML 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/). ## Examples 下面的示例将 XML Web service 设置为 `MyName` 。The following example sets of the XML Web service to `MyName`. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceAttribute.Name Example](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute.Name Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceAttribute.Name Example](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute.Name Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Namespace : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于 XML Web services 的默认 XML 命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the default XML namespace to use for the XML Web service.

value.span: 用于 XML Web services 的默认 XML 命名空间。

span.span: The default XML namespace to use for the XML Web service.

value.span: 默认值在 属性中指定。

span.span: The default is specified in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 命名空间提供了一种在 XML 文档中创建名称的方法，该文档由 (URI) 的统一资源标识符标识。XML namespaces offer a way to create names in an XML document that are identified by a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 通过使用 XML 命名空间，可以唯一标识 XML 文档中的元素或属性。By using XML namespaces you can uniquely identify elements or attributes in a XML document. XML Web service 的服务说明是在 XML 中定义的，尤其是在 Web Services 描述语言 (WSDL) 中定义的。The service description for a XML Web service is defined in XML, specifically in Web Services Description Language (WSDL). 在 XML Web service 的服务说明中， 用作直接与 XML Web service 相关的 XML 元素的默认命名空间。Within the Service Description for an XML Web service, is used as the default namespace for XML elements directly pertaining to the XML Web service. 例如，XML Web service 及其 XML Web service 方法的名称与属性中指定的命名空间有关 `Namespace` 。For example, the name of the XML Web service and its XML Web service methods pertain to the namespace specified in the `Namespace` property. 特定于 WSDL 的元素属于 命名空间。Elements that are specific to WSDL pertain to the namespace. 对于使用 SOAP 调用 XML Web service 的 XML Web service 客户端，可以选择性地添加 或 以调用 XML Web service 方法。For XML Web service clients using SOAP to call an XML Web service, you can optionally add the or to call an XML Web service method. 如果客户端调用使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web service，则 默认情况下，和 属性均派生自 属性。If the client is calling an XML Web service created using ASP.NET, the , and properties are all derived from the property by default. 例如，给定 XML Web service 方法名称，属性为 `Time` ，则 `Namespace` `http://www.contoso.com/` `Action` 默认情况下该属性为 `http://www.contoso.com/Time` 。For instance, given an XML Web service method name of `Time` and a `Namespace` property of `http://www.contoso.com/`, the `Action` property is `http://www.contoso.com/Time` by default. 若要更改 XML Web service 方法的、和的默认设置， `RequestNamespace` `ResponseNamespace` 可以向 `Action` XML Web service 方法中添加 。To change the default settings for `RequestNamespace`, `ResponseNamespace`, and `Action` for an XML Web service method, you can add a to the XML Web service method. > [!NOTE] > XML 命名空间不同于类所驻留的命名空间，Windows SDK。An XML namespace is different from the namespace the class resides in, in terms of the Windows SDK. 若要指定类的命名空间，请参阅[命名空间关键字](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/namespace-keywords)（如果你用 c # 编写）。To specify the namespace for the class, see [Namespace Keywords](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/namespace-keywords) if you writing in C#. ## Examples 下面的示例将设置 为 `http://www.contoso.com` ，并 通过将添加 到 XML Web service 方法来重写属性的命名空间 `Time` 。The following example sets to `http://www.contoso.com` and overrides that namespace for the property by adding a to the `Time` XML Web service method. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceAttribute.Namespace Example](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute.Namespace Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceAttribute.Namespace Example](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute.Namespace Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]
